title: Radisson Hotel Group signs Glenview Resort in Himachal Pradesh's Kasauli
description: Radisson Hotel Group has signed Glenview Resort in Kasauli, expanding its presence in Himachal Pradesh to 10 hotels. The resort will open in Q4 2024, featuring various rooms, event spaces, a swimming pool, gym, and dining options. The location is easily accessible from Chandigarh International Airport and popular destinations like Shimla and Solan.
